extendedInfo.description: Did you ever take a once-in-a-lifetime photo, but it  didn't come out as good as it could have been?  Do you think it would have been a perfect photo only if you had pressed the button a few seconds before or after to capture that perfect photo. Then, Slider Cam is the app for you!This Camera app features magical "Timeline Lens", designed to capture those âmagic momentsâ that you miss by not hitting the camera shutter quick enough. It allows you to step back in time when you miss a shot, rewind the shots or the sections of photographs and take your pick from the previous seconds worth of frames. Note: This is a free trial for 14 days with full features. Please buy 'Slider Cam' for ads free & PRO version.Did your photo get blurred? No worries... Rewind the photo to get the best shotNot happy with your smile in the photo? No worriesâ¦ Simply rewind your face and youâre good to go!Capture those moments that your fingers werenât fast enough to capture.  Replace all your camera apps/ photo editor/ photo effects app with just one: Slider Cam ! More editing features than any Fast Burst Camera app!CAMERA FEATURES (availability depends on Phone):â  Front facing camera â  Optical / Digital zoom â  Live previews  of Instagram like Color Effects & White Balanceâ  Camera Settings: Focus Mode,  Exposure &  Scene Modeâ  Flash ModesEDITOR FEATURES:â  Pick the best shotâ  Edit the section of the photo (Circular Marker)â  Multiple Edits for a photoâ  Adjustable frames NEWS & SUPPORT:Get the latest news & update on Slider Cam, post your best shot on our Facebook fan page or follow us on Twitter:â¢	Website:  http://www.pixature.com/â¢	Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/slidercameraâ¢	Twitter:  https://twitter.com/slidercameraâ¢	Email: contact@pixature.comThank you for your download!TIPS:* Set the focus mode to INFINITY, to get the best photo for each frame.* Use Horizontal slider for changing the photo & circular slider for changing the section of photo or photo frames* Checkout youtube video to see how Slider Cam works!Note: The frame images are of lesser resolution than original photo.

reviews.title: Hate Apps that say Free & are NOT FREE! TRIAL ONLY
reviews.comment: Not FREE, This is SHORT TRIAL VERSION :(
reviews.author: Kkay M

reviews.title: Nice concept
reviews.comment: But lackluster finish. When choosing a still image for the head for instance if you moved the camera slightly it makes the picture look horrible. Even if you adjust it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes!
reviews.comment: First app in over a year to completely free my phone.  Too bad, seems like a good idea.
reviews.author: Ian James

reviews.title: Nice.
reviews.comment: Nice. Different from other cameras. But free version crashing often.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazinnnng
reviews.comment: Try this camera........ its a nice...I promise you. :-)
reviews.author: Rommel Enson
